name: Pumpkin Kid
description:
You find yourself in a graveyard with nothing but a shovel, and gun, and a pumpkin glowing on your head...

A game by @jzfeng and @jubnaut, with music by @carlospazuzu.

Instructions

Arrow keys to move
SPACE to attack
Z to activate pumpkins
X to switch weapons
C to feed candles to pumpkins

Fend off the monsters and collect candles to maintain your vision. Stand near a pumpkin and press Z to light it up. The pumpkins will provide valuable drops, but you must keep them alive by feeding them candles! How long can you last in the graveyard?

Items

Candy: replenishes HP
Loot bag: replenishes ammo

https://github.com/ju-de/pumpkin-kid
